titleStmt.title: Sr St. John Brodrick's vindication of himself from the aspersions cast on him in a pamphlet written by Sir Rich. Buckley entituled, The proposal for sending back the nobility and gentry of Ireland, together with a vindication of the same
titleStmt.author: Brodrick, St. John, Sir, 1658 or 9-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
